boardgame.name: Pay Dirt
boardgame.description: Pay Dirt is an engine-building, worker placement game set in frigid Alaska for 2-5 players. Players are competing to manage and grow their entire mining outfit while acquiring the most gold before the ground is too frozen to dig. The Alaskan countryside is an inhospitable environment, so players will face hardships that affect their entire outfit _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; not to mention the ever-dropping temperature that will shut down their operation._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Pay Dirt players start with a small basic crew, an unimpressive claim, mediocre equipment and just a little bit of cash to make a go in one of the toughest competitions this side of the globe. Gold mining isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;t cheap and players will have to sell their gold throughout the game to keep the equipment running and their workers happy. Through clever use of their equipment and workers, players can make their mining outfits more efficient and dialed in to their preference of play. Will you recruit heavily and stack your camp with workers or will you keep your eyes on better and more efficient equipment? Will you have what it takes to hit to strike it rich and hit pay dirt?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: This sale has been auto-generated for the auction: [geekurl=/geeklist/181847/item/3559022#3559022]Item for Geeklist _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Yet another shelf clearing auction...includes some pnp games_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; [/geekurl] Please do not purchase if you didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t win this auction. Kickstarter edition. New in Shrink.
Brand New Sealed Kickstarter Edition, Promos and everything included. Please add $10 for shipping w/ tracking, thank you.
Kickstarter

Crash Games (CRA501) Pay Dirt is an engine-building, worker placement game set in frigid Alaska for 2-5 players. Players are competing to manage and grow their entire mining outfit while acquiring the most gold before the ground is too frozen to dig. The Alaskan countryside is an inhospitable environment, so players will face hardships that affect their entire outfit - not to mention the ever-dropping temperature that will shut down their operation. In Pay Dirt players start with a small basic crew, an unimpressive claim, mediocre equipment and just a little bit of cash to make a go in one of the toughest competitions this side of the globe. Gold mining isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t cheap and players will have to sell their gold throughout the game to keep the equipment running and their workers happy. Through clever use of their equipment and workers, players can make their mining outfits more efficient and dialed in to their preference of play. Will you recruit heavily and stack your camp with workers or will you keep your eyes on better and more efficient equipment? Will you have what it takes to hit to strike it rich and hit pay dirt?
Reserved for reddish22 Kickstarter edition: includes the three mini expansions.
This is for Pay Dirt, Massilia, and La Isla won at auction.
